Title: Relates to updating rate components for the non-capital component of rates of payment by governmental agencies for inpatient services provided by residential health care facilities
Summary: Relates to requiring rate components for the non-capital component of rates of payment by governmental agencies for inpatient services provided by residential health care facilities to be updated no later than 1/1/2027, and every 5 years thereafter using the most currently available cost report data.
LawCode: Amd ยง2808, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to updating rate components for the non-capital component of rates of payment by governmental agencies for inpatient services provided by residential health care facilities
